string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody on Southperry.net knows that a Mapler's best friend is a giant fluffy Chinchilla; mostly because it doubles a pillow between adventures.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A mysterious stone infused with the power of the aliens. If you insert it into an item's open socket, the stats of the alien stone will be added to the item.

* STR : +1#

string.value: A tiny chair for Haruaki's fox. \n#cRestores 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Commanding warriors love to dole out orders from atop this chair. \n#cRestores 60 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Tot knows how to teach, and this chair keeps it going forever and ever and ever.\nIf you sit in Know-How Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: What is a blank canvas, but an invitation to dazzle?\nIf you sit in Unpainted Masterpiece Chair, 10 HP and 10 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This painting could have gotten a little more love.\nIf you sit in Sort of a Painting Chair, 30 HP and 30 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Holy moly look at this work! The line weight, the brush work, the chiaroscuro lighting!\nIf you sit in Ultimate Masterpiece Chair, 50 HP and 50 MP are recovered every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Is this what it's like to sit in a cloud? Probably not, clouds are just frozen gatherings of gaseous moisture! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: 5% of hunting EXP will be accumulated. Party EXP, quest EXP are not subjected. Once accumulated EXP reach its max(30000), you must sit on this chair for at least 30 min. to reflect it in your EXP. Even you stand up from the chair before 30 min. is over, accumulated EXP will remains. However, if logout time passes 48 hrs or if you delete this chair, accumulated EXP will be wasted. Only one chair can be stay ON. Set ON/OFF status by right click on it. Mouse over the icon to check currently accumulated EXP. HP & MP recover is not available with this chair.

string.value: It's a small candle that the manager has left in your care. The candle extinguishes and disappears if you exit the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: A candle used on the birthday cake for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory. The fire will be blown out when the game is ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: Memory chip that Agent W left which contains information on Master M. Enter password once in evey 1 hr, otherwise it will be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mr. Oh sells these rare spices at the Maple 4th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can find these memorabilia from Thailand at the Maple 4th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lena sells delicious unagi at the Maple 4th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: This taxydermy shark, handmade by Tae Gong himself, can be found at the Maple 4th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hanako sells this exquisite at the Maple 4th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: King-sized star Cassandra created. If you carry it with you during the Star Star festival, you will receive a Star Stamp every hour. When \n#c game ends, it disappears.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious figure that has yet to be revealed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid ice crystal that contains Maha Charm. Hold onto it for one hour, and the crystal will melt, enabling you to acquire the Charm.

string.name: desc
string.value: A charm that contains the protection from Maha, the spirit of Pole Arm. Take this to Cassandra to earn an opportunity to answer questions and receive prizes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle given by Cassandra. This candle will turn off automatically when the game ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: A star that contains Cassandra's Internet Cafe Big Star. Hold on to it for 90 minutes, and it'll transform into Cassandra's Internet Cafe Big Star. Will disappear after logging off from the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Internet Cafe Big Star that Cassandra's looking for. It'll disappear once you log off from the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold onto this for 30 minutes and the cold weather will turn it into slush. It's so delicate it will disappear if you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Give it to Cassandra before it disappears!

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon Egg that Cassandra has left in your care. You must hold it close and keep it warm for one hour for it to hatch. Logging out will cause it to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon that hatched from the egg Cassandra left with you. Return it to Cassandra to receive a reward!

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty compass that will eventually be used to make a Golden Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black feather from a bird that has not been identified. Keep an eye on it for 15 minutes and it will transform into a Bright Feather.\n#cIt will disappear once you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A bright feather from a bird that has not been identified. Take it over to the Maple Admin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A large star specially made to commemorate MapleStory's 4th anniversary. Carry it with you for 45 minutes to receive a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Hawkeye sticker. Collect all 5 Cygnus Knights stickers to receive a limited reward.

string.value: The sand in Carta's Sandglass has trickled down to the bottom.

string.value: A monkey doll that Gaga lost. Collect 30 and bring them to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shiny monkey charm. When held by a Cannoneer, the area surrounding their monkey will glow.\n#cClick to turn On/Off.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This stamp is made in commemoration of Maple Heritage Day, and can be exchanged in batches of 3,000 for a Maple Heritage Medal.

string.name: desc
string.value: Juicy red strawberries for making Strawberry Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet melon for making Melon Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty kiwi for making Kiwi Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: A plump pineapple for making Pineapple Juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Syrup for sweetening fruit juice. Keep it for 30 minutes, and it may develop a legendary taste...

string.name: desc
string.value: A fully matured maple syrup, featuring a bold, complex flavor unlike any other.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lamp spoken of in legends past. Keep the light on for 50 minutes to receive a Legends Coin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A star stone that contains energy from all the green stars in space. Place it in your Set-up window and fill up your gauge to activate the Going Green skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device that measures the amount of Good Vibe in Maple World. Keep it in your Set-up window for 30 minutes to complete the measurement.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Good Vibe Detector that has completed its measurement. The blinking light means it's done.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-cooked chicken drumstick. It is both tasty and nutritious.

string.name: desc
string.value: A well-cooked chicken drumstick. It is both tasty and nutritious.

string.name: desc
string.value: An emblem worn by the commanders under the Black Mage. Their origin and full meaning are unknown.

string.name: desc
string.value: A symbol of Waikiki. Just looking at it makes you dream of the beach.

string.name: desc
string.value: An igloo, partially melted by the sun. Hold it for 30 minutes without logging out, and it may return to its legendary form...

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary igloo. Gaze at it, and feel the howling winds of Alaska!

string.name: desc
string.value: A recorder that can be used to record nearby noises. It can record for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A completed recorder that has reached its 30-minute capacity. The recorded noise can be used to make sounds that monsters hate.

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy roasted turkey you remember enjoying during Thanksgiving.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Leaf that pulsates with a golden aura.

string.name: desc
string.value: A good looking monkey doll. If you look closely, you might think that this monkey looks like a celebrity.

string.name: desc
string.value: A commemorative stamp that was made with the support of many Maplers.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal of stars that only have filled with the memory of blue stars that exist in the outer space.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dirty piece of trash. You should pick it up to keep this Maple World a cleaner place! Just wash your hands afterwards.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Totally Cool Melon that can be a material to make a tasty Melon juice.

string.name: desc
string.value: You put the rain-soaked Fireworks in the Magic Powder. Now they will dry out in about 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thanks to the Magic Powder, these Fireworks are completely dry and ready to use! Take these to Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old and faded photograph of someone.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old and worn out hankerchief. You can't even tell its original color.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bizarre device that might lead you to Cassandra's first love. Have this in your Set-up window for 30 minutes to get results.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Love Detector that has turned something up. Take this to Gaga and show him the results.

string.name: desc

string.value: You closed the bottle after 30 minutes just like Gaga told you. Do you see moonlight in the bottle? Well, deliver it to Gaga anyway.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone containing the power of Virtue. The stone absorbs power every time you strike a monster. When the stone is full, you can use the basic attack key to use Virtue's Blessing, which lasts for 1 hour and can be stacked with other buffs.\r\n#cWhile Virtue's Blessing is in effect, the stone will no longer absorb power. The strength of the blessing will also increase when you reach Level 31 and Level 71.#

string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Grants five trips to Nero's Purrfect Purchase Palace, where you can purchase special items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Hair Color Coupon (REG).

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Royal Vacation Hair Coupon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Mermaid Mirror that allows you get a special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Fusion Anvil that allows you to change the appearance of equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a House Wedding Ticket.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive three Item Megaphones.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive a Weapon Bypass Key that allows you to equip weapons that are up to 20 levels higher than you.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive four Armor Bypass Keys that allow you to equip armors that are up to 20 levels higher than you.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. Win it to receive an Owl of Minerva that allows you to easily search for an item at the market.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. You can receive Maple Points that can be used to purchase cash items at the Cash Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. You can receive Maple Points that can be used to purchase cash items at the Cash Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. You can receive Maple Points that can be used to purchase cash items at the Cash Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Prize from the Tempest Festival event. You can receive Maple Points that can be used to purchase cash items at the Cash Shop.

string.name: desc
string.value: Strange cube-shaped contraption needed to play the Maple Board game. Your roll determines how many steps your piece can take.

string.name: desc
string.value: Brain-wave measuring device that Bruce placed on monsters to research their behavior before the rain.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mar the Fairy's treasured leaf fan. One swing of the fan and you will feel a gentle forest freeze!

string.name: desc
string.value: Rock-hard ice from the Ice Pillar. It won't melt no matter how hot the weather is.

string.name: desc
string.value: Wind Gourd that Lisa requested for Windy the Wind Fairy. Gourd has 'To my friend Windy..." on it. It's pretty Windy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A score used by a ghost that appears in the Music Room. It has a total of 13 pages.

string.name: desc
string.value: Microphone that the principal uses during assembly.

string.name: desc
string.value: Repair tool that the repairman uses to repair school properties.

string.name: desc
string.value: Name tag of delinquent students that violated school rules.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cosmos flower petal. If you remain in game for 30 minutes while carrying the petal, then Cassandra will give you a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: A set of wooden sticks that is used for the Game of Yut event. You can play as many Games of Yut as the number of your Yut Stick Sets in the Set-up window. Start a game of Yut by opening the Yut Board. You can only own up to #c99# Yut Stick Sets at a time and receive up to #c80# a day.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sports drink that gets absorbed by the body faster than water.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen sports drink which gets absorbed by the body way faster than water. It's so cold!

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery red rice cake. It's so spicy!

string.name: desc
string.value: A yummy rice roll made of many tasty ingredients.

string.name: desc
string.value: A broiled squid that smells buttery and delicious.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Han Gwa that is shaped like the letter M.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Han Gwa that is shaped like the letter A.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Han Gwa that is shaped like the letter P.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Han Gwa that is shaped like the letter L.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Han Gwa that is shaped like the letter E.

string.name: desc
string.value: Baby Moon Bunny's number one treasure. Keeping it in the Set-up window for 30 minutes can restore the colors of the picture.

string.name: desc
string.value: The old, faded moon photo has been restored by the power of moonlight. Show it to Baby Moon Bunny.

string.name: desc
string.value: A candy that can be gifted to your friends in Maple World. To give this candy, #cright-click a character, and select [Give Halloween Candy]#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that lets you receive a special gift during Star of Masquerade, an event that begins at every #c8 p.m.# as a part of the Halloween event. Do not discard this ticket, or you won't be eligible for the Star of Masquerade raffle event.

string.name: desc
string.value: You have been invited to Maple Castle.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old test paper that reads, "School of Magic: 0 points. You can apply yourself more than this."

string.name: desc
string.value: An old journal that is filled with the ramblings of a frightened young student.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone slab signed by the students that wanted to shut down the school.

string.name: desc
string.value: A seal crest that is imprinted with a message, "Don't forget October's full moon that brings back old friends."

string.name: desc
string.value: A locked box that contains an ornate party dress.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter that is sealed with Cygnus's love.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's an ideal snack to eat while watching the Maple Post Season.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the ghosts in Maple Castle dropped this suspicious letter.

string.name: desc
string.value: A locked box that contains an ornate party dress.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of a Jewel Pang Pang Admission Ticket. Collect all the pieces to create a complete ticket.

string.name: desc
string.value: A lucky clover leaf. Carry it for 30 minutes for good luck.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Clover Leaf has turned into a luck-bringing four-leaf clover.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra's pink bead. She said it would turn into Pit-a-patting Heart Bead if you remain in game for 1 hour while carrying it. Let's see if that's true. Don't log out partway through, or you will lose this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra's Pink Bead has turned into a pit-a-patting heart-shaped bead. Whose love do you think it carries within?

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra's yellow maple leaf. She said it would turn into Red Spring Maple Leaf if you remain in game for 30 minutes while carrying it. Don't log out partway through, or you will lose this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A maple leaf in burning red color. Spring in Maple World is so beautiful!

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this shovel on piles of snow. Don't log out partway through, or you will lose this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A hand warmer that keeps your hands warm. Don't log out partway through, or you will lose this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Instant noodles that can be enjoyed any time, from anywhere. All you need is hot water! Don't log out partway through, or you will lose this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A popsicle just enough for one person. If you keep it for 30 minutes without logging out, it will double in size!

string.name: desc
string.value: A popsicle you can share with someone. Double the love, double the joy!

string.name: desc
string.value: A number 2 for celebrating the coming of 2013.

string.name: desc
string.value: A number 0 for celebrating the coming of 2013.

string.name: desc
string.value: A number 1 for celebrating the coming of 2013.

string.name: desc
string.value: A number 3 for celebrating the coming of 2013.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blazing young sun that is born to be the first sun of the new year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collection Snail Statue. You can drag it and add it to Casandra's Collection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collection Slime Statue. You can drag it and add it to Casandra's Collection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collection Pig Statue. You can drag it and add it to Casandra's Collection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collection Junior Pepe Statue. You can drag it and add it to Casandra's Collection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collection Sand Rabbit Statue. You can drag it and add it to Casandra's Collection.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special Orange Mushroom Collection Statue that fits anywhere in Casandra's Collection. Regardless of its kind, you can put it in wherever you wish and complete Casandra's Collection Line.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a pretty stone to be used for Casandra's Statue piece. Let's bring it to Casandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a cage that used to hold Pygmys that got lost in the hunting field. It seems that this is the Pygmy that the Operator was searching for.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a gold coin issued to celebrate the Valentine's Day. It's not worth much, but the coin collectors seem anxious to get it.

string.name: desc
string.value: These are leftover pieces of chocolate from Valentine's Day. Not only there are so many of them, they've been littered around as troublesome trash.

string.name: desc
string.value: These are Casandra's Flower Shoes that were stolen by Fluorescent Ghost. From the shine, I can tell they were purchased recently. Casandra has smaller feet than I expected.

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a very fine sieve. It is a tool used to sieve grain powder, but it is also known to be effective when driving out Yagwanggui. They say that Yagwanggui, who likes to count things, comes at night to steal the shoes, but ends up leaving at daybreak after counting the holes in the sieve, one by one.

string.name: desc
string.value: These are new flower shoes, not even a day old since they were purchased. The shine on the shoes lets you know that these are a pair of brand new shoes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The new shoes got a little dirty after I carried around them in my hands. It looks like that shiny glow is gone, and they don't look so new anymore. #c Logging out may make you loose the shoes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Stay logged in for 30 minutes to purify the water within.

string.name: desc
string.value: A nice jug of cool clean water for the people of Rwanda. Take it back to Cassandra so she can get it into the right hands!

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra needs [Other Ether] to perform her divinations. Stay online with this for 30 minutes to fill it up.

string.name: desc
string.value: Flask full of [Other Ether]. Take this to the Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: Donate equipment item and fill up the gauge to receive Tempest letter. The gauge can be filled up to 6 times per day.

string.name: name
string.value: Warm-heartedness is needed for person's box.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box contains a warm-heartedness collected from the joy of exchanging presents.

string.name: desc
string.value: Title for those that enjoy the Year of Snake.\r\n#cCan be toggled ON/OFF by clicking.#

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty bottle. If you have it for 30 minutes, it will be filled up.

string.name: desc
string.value: A full bottle. You can bring it to Cassandra for rewards.
